amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase EERE funding by $226,800,000 which would have provided a return to the previous year's funding levels for the Weatherization Assistance Program, the State Energy Program, and the Building Technologies Programs. The increase would have been offset by a reduction in weapons funding by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase EERE by $226,800,000 offset by a decrease of a similar amount in weapons funding.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tonko amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 149 - 273 (Roll no. 548).
